line_1: But not a flow'r of scent or flavour
line_2: Would do the bride so great a favour,

line_1: What gave it that delicious flavour;
line_2: Then hinted, as a special favour,

line_1: Our Will shall be wild fowl, of excellent flavour,
line_2: And Dick with his pepper, shall heighten their savour:

line_1: To give her food the poignant flavour;
line_2: And to each sauce, its proper savour.
